"AH!": "Ohhh, it's you, <%me>. Thank goodness..."
"I've been in Resol Forest before, but it really is awful when you're out here alone."
"The enemies are so strong, and you never know where or when they might jump out at you."
"On top of that, the atmosphere of this place is terrify--... Er, terribly hard to get used to."
"But, I've gotten a lot better at fighting compared to when we first came to Resol Forest."
"Back then, I was such a bundle of nerves I could barely keep up with you and Manon."
"I couldn't even remember which paths we'd already been down..."
"But I feel like being able to overcome that battle was like a huge wake-up call for me."
"Really, I owe it all to you and Manon, <%me>."
"We all promised to fight together, after all."
"We've gotta keep an eye on you, after all."
"Yeah. Yeah, we did. Thanks."
"Hey! Don't start sounding like my Dad!"
"Seriously though, I appreciate it. Thanks."
"When I heard Bruder went missing at the same time Nex Aelio showed up..."
"All I could think about was saving him, so I just threw my hand up and volunteered."
"Even though I had no idea what I was up against, or even what kind of place Resol Forest was like."
"But when you and Manon volunteered right next to me, you both gave me the courage to follow through."
"I felt like, as long as I'm with you and Manon, we can stand up against any sort of enemy."
"... My Dad always got mad at me like \"You need to think before you act!\", and stuff."
"But he'd let me down easy and say \"Still, it's better than overthinking it and not acting at all.\"."
"I think it might actually be a part of my nature."
"Say, <%me>. Hypothetically speaking, stop me if it looks like I'm about to do something really reckless, okay?"
"You and Manon really know how to calm me down and help keep me focused."
"You got it."
"You'd better not do anything reckless though."
"Good. Thanks."
"Hypothetically! I'm just speaking hypothetically here."
"On the off chance I lose sense of my surroundings again, you know?"
"We've gotta look out for each other after all, right?"
"See you around."
